Desc.entry: A registered charity which arranges social activities for deaf people, friends and families. Resources include indoor games facilities, sign language classes, ladies group, lunch club, church meetings and a snack bar.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Wed-Fri 10am-3pm(office times); Wednesday (games night), Thursday (lunch club), alternate Saturdays (bingo), 1st Sun in the month (deaf church), once a fortnight 12noon-3pm (ladies group, please contact for details)
